name: Protein interaction prediction for 6 organisms with 5k pairs each
description: The main goal of this experiment is evaluate the PredRep workflow against large data from 6 different species.

datasets.name: predrep_thaliana
datasets.description: 5k pairs, 50% from HINT and String with 800 to 1000 as confidence score and 50% from string from 100 to 200 as confidence score for a_thaliana

datasets.name: predrep_elegans
datasets.description: 5k pairs, 50% from HINT and String with 800 to 1000 as confidence score and 50% from string from 100 to 200 as confidence score for c_elegans

datasets.name: predrep_melanogaster
datasets.description: 5k pairs, 50% from HINT and String with 800 to 1000 as confidence score and 50% from string from 100 to 200 as confidence score for d_melanogaster

datasets.name: predrep_coli
datasets.description: 5k pairs, 50% from HINT and String with 800 to 1000 as confidence score and 50% from string from 100 to 200 as confidence score for e_coli

datasets.name: predrep_sapiens
datasets.description: 5k pairs, 50% from HINT and String with 800 to 1000 as confidence score and 50% from string from 100 to 200 as confidence score for h_sapiens

datasets.name: predrep_musculus
datasets.description: 5k pairs, 50% from HINT and String with 800 to 1000 as confidence score and 50% from string from 100 to 200 as confidence score for m_musculus

datasets.name: predrep_cerevisiae
datasets.description: 5k pairs, 50% from HINT and String with 800 to 1000 as confidence score and 50% from string from 100 to 200 as confidence score for s_cerevisiae
